main.name: Let's build awesome technology together!
main.description: I am a Software Developer, especially in Front End Developer. I believe software is a great combination between artistry and engineering. Let's see how I can tell you about me first, feel free to check my resume website!
main.bio: Hi! I am Felicia. I love to learning something new and discover new experiences about software development. Creativity in technology and building useful technology is my passion. I believe that hard work and creativity while building technology will produce a better and useful technology.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me by filling the form below.

education.description: I took Informatics Major in Universitas Multimedia Nusantara. It is located in Tangerang, Indonesia. In there, I studied about the basic of algorithm and programming using C, the basic of data structure using C++, and object oriented programming using C++. I learnt about website development using javascript, php, css and learnt the Code Igniter framework for web programming. I also learnt about android application development using Android Studio using Java programming language. I learnt about cross platform application too, using Ionic framework combined with Angular JS. In the other hand, I also learnt about database using MySQL, Machine Learning coded using python, and computer networking.

education.school: Don Bosco Padang Senior High School
education.degree: Senior High School with Science Major
education.description: I went to Don Bosco Padang Senior High School is located in my hometown, Padang, West Sumatera. During my senior high school, I took Science Major. Due to 2013's curriculum, students were given choices to had two electives during first year, and one elective during second and third year. In my first year, I choosed Japanese language and accounting. Then, I choosed accounting for my elective.
During my junior high school, I took an acceleration class that made me graduate in two years only.
